title: Payment calculator
description: Rare West Chelsea Duplex with Private 750 Sq Ft Terrace and Low Monthlys. Residence 1G at 445 West 19th Street offers a rare opportunity to enjoy townhouse-style living with the convenience of a condominium. This spacious two-level home is designed for comfort, versatility, and indoor/outdoor living at its best. The main floor features a bright, open living and dining area with oversized windows and a sleek modern kitchen . Step outside to your extraordinary 750 sq ft private garden terrace — a true urban oasis. Perfect for entertaining, dining al fresco, or simply unwinding, the terrace provides space rarely found in Manhattan. The lower level offers flexibility to suit your lifestyle, whether as a primary bedroom suite, media room, or home office, with the privacy and quiet that duplex living provides. Located on a tree-lined block in prime West Chelsea, 445 West 19th Street places you moments from the High Line, Hudson River Park, Chelsea Market, and some of the city’s best dining, shopping, and galleries. With its expansive garden terrace, flexible duplex layout , and unbeatable location, Residence 1G is the perfect balance of city living and private retreat. Ongoing special assessment of $366.75/Month. Ends in February 2026.
